price: 51. Ir iš tiesų, Mes sunaikinome tokius kaip jūs. Ar atsiras tada tas, kuris prisimena (arba priima pamoką)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
